message: Let's split it fairly, don't risk losing it all!
Considering the inflation affecting my share, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor to balance the diminishing value. Let's settle this fairly before it's too late.
Don't wait too long, the longer we wait, the less you'll get!
With each round, my share loses more value due to inflation. Let's agree on an even split of 50-50 to end this quickly and fairly before my portion diminishes further.
